name: Four Last Things
description: Four Last Things is a point-and-click adventure game made from Renaissance-era paintings and public domain recordings of classical music. It is about sin, and the Four Last Things – Death, Judgement, Heaven and Hell – and strives to be intelligent and ridiculous in equal measures.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2 GHz - Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 2.6 GHz - Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible with 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers
